schedule.title: This Weekâ€™s Streaming Schedule
schedule.noteHtml:
This weekâ€™s schedule is...... none ğŸ–¤

â€œSelf-Indulgence Weekâ€ is a week devised so that
Asobu can live freely and comfortablyâ€”
a full-on guerrilla streaming week
with absolutely no schedule at all.
To be honest, I wonâ€™t do any annoying streams,
I wonâ€™t take requests for singing streams,
I wonâ€™t read every single comment,
itâ€™s the ultimate my-pace.
______Lifespans, just follow me.

about.title: About
about.bodyHtml:

I do daytime chatting streams and nighttime game streams~

Letâ€™s have fun and use our lifespan wisely!

â€¢ Easier to stream even at night

The OTODASUâ…¡-G Iâ€™m interested in is around Â¥200,000, so I want to work hard to raise funds for it!

Ways to support

If you have any questions, please DM me on X.

Lastly
If you support Â¥10,000 or more for the soundproof room, youâ€™ll be invited to a supporters-only live stream.
Also, Iâ€™ll grant you a special ã€Titleã€‘ and honor you on a public â€œSoundproof Room Implementation Celebration Stream.â€
*Your name for the recognition can be customized.*

Lifespans, thank you always for your support! Iâ€™d be so happy if you support my dream of getting a soundproof room too. Thank you!

support.bodyHtml:
About Support


â™¡
Support to Help Grow the Channel
Likes / Shares / Watch-time support

To help grow my subscribers, it would really help if you â€œLikeâ€ my videos and live streamsâ€”and also press the â€œShareâ€ button!

Right now Iâ€™m aiming for monetization, and for that we need everyone to watch my videos and live streams for a total of 3,000 hours.

So if you can, Iâ€™d be super happy if you play my videos even silently while bathing, sleeping, studying, or working.

â–¶ Open the playlist

*After 3,000 hours, I also want to surpass 4,000 hours!*
*Shorts donâ€™t count toward this, so please note that.*

Also, joining events and contests helps increase visibility and excitement for my activitiesâ€”please join in if you can!

Iâ€™d be really happy if we can work together
to make my activities even more fun and exciting!

Â¥
Financial Support
PayPay / Goods / Membership, etc.
For all financial support such as tips and goods purchases, we do not offer refunds, so we may not be able to respond to inquiries of that kind.
Please support only with proper judgment.
Make sure to read to the end!


YouTube â¡ Remaining until monetization: 2,166/3000 hours watched!!

YouTube Membership â¡ If/when I open it, Iâ€™ll do members-only streams and projects!

During game streams â¡ When gacha banners appear in Genshin or Identity V, there may be PayPay â€œracesâ€ where you can directly support as in-game currency ğŸ–¤

Always-available PayPay â¡ No fees and 100% goes to Asobuâ€”recommended if you want your lifespan to contribute without waste!! (But read to the end first!)
The link is here

Support via PayPay


*Lastly*

Asobu isnâ€™t struggling to live.
What I want is your time.
The time to come watch my streams, think about me, and support me.

Iâ€™m truly grateful to those who feel value in what I do and support me.

Thank you for your precious lifespan for me......

fanclub.bodyHtml:
Fan Club (FANBOX)

Join within January and youâ€™ll get one debut good for free!
Basic perks: ã€Limited goodsã€‘ delivered irregularly ğŸ¤ If you miss it once, youâ€™ll never get it again...ğŸ–¤
Join Join JoinğŸ¤
Start here (Important)
How limited goods work / Shipping / Anonymous delivery
Basic perks: ã€Limited goodsã€‘ delivered irregularly ğŸ¤
If you miss it once, youâ€™ll never get it again...ğŸ–¤

ã€About Limited Goodsã€‘

Goods gifts are not every month.
They are an irregular perk every 2â€“6 months.

Goods plans are posted privately in the log, and only fan club members can purchase.
For the public, there will be no schedule, illustration, or announcements.
After the month ends, photos are released publicly as â€œLast monthâ€™s goods.â€

â‹ˆAs a rule, limited goods are not restocked.
â‹ˆGoods arrive about 2 months after you request shipping.

Example)
In January, sketches for Marchâ€™s fan club limited White Day goods are posted in the log.
Please request shipping on BOOTH within January.
Production happens in February.
Shipping is done sequentially so they arrive in early March.

â‹ˆAnonymous delivery is available, so neither side shares name/address.
â‹ˆYou only pay BOOTH fees and shipping (Â¥100â€“Â¥370).
â‹ˆShipping requests close after the end of the month (e.g., Jan 31 in this example).
â‹ˆOne free goods item per person per cycle.
ã€€If you really want an extra, you can purchase just one additional item by paying the goods price (wow, youâ€™re dedicated).
â‹ˆBecause itâ€™s made-to-order, requests and extra purchases cannot be canceled.
â‹ˆEven if you leave after requesting shipping, goods will still be shipped. If you donâ€™t want it, contact me with the order number.
â‹ˆDelivery timing may shift depending on production, condition, weather, and other projects. Progress will be shared in the log, whether good or bad.

Lifespan Verified Plan
Â¥1500 / Log + irregular limited items

1500 yen

ï¼¿ï¼¿Verified Lifespans unlock further access ğŸ–¤

1. Access to the log ğŸ¤

A diary I update whenever I feel like it!
Behind-the-scenes after streams, progress on what Iâ€™m preparing,
progress on goods in production, early viewing links for videos,
scrapped scenes...... and moreâ€”still thinking!
I might even ask for advice when Iâ€™m stuck.
For improving my activities,
Iâ€™d be happy if you think with me!

2. Limited items gifts ğŸ¤

Voice â¡ 1â€“3 per month
Goods â¡ Acrylic keychains, acrylic stands, magnets, etc., sent irregularly. As mentioned, there may be months with no goods.

Lifespan Connected
Â¥3000 / Lower perks + shikishi (irregular)

3000 yen

ï¼¿ï¼¿Connected Lifespans unlock further access ğŸ–¤

This plan includes all perks from the â€œLifespan Verifiedâ€ plan.

1. Shikishi (autograph board) ğŸ¤

â¡ Normally Iâ€™ll mail it!
ã€€If you prefer a photo, Iâ€™ll take a photo and send it~
ã€€When fan club limited goods appear,
ã€€Iâ€™ll add a small drawing or signature together~!

â‹ˆSame frequency as limited goods. Not every monthâ€”please note.
â‹ˆIf you receive limited goods, it will be packed together.
ã€€If you donâ€™t receive goods, additional shipping is required: Â¥100, or Â¥370 for anonymous shipping.

Lifespan Linked
Â¥5000 / Lower perks + 1on1 talk (chat + video)

5000 yen

ï¼¿ï¼¿Linked Lifespans unlock even more access ğŸ–¤

This plan includes all perks from â€œLifespan Verifiedâ€ and â€œLifespan Connected.â€

1. 1-on-1 conversation via chat + video message ğŸ¤

â¡ In a private X chat,
ã€€weâ€™ll do 4 round trips (you 4 times, me 4 times)
ã€€of text chatâ€”then Iâ€™ll send you a video message at the end.

â€¢ For â€œleave-a-messageâ€ style
Once we follow each other on X, send your first message anytime.
Iâ€™ll reply when itâ€™s Asobuâ€™s timing ğŸ¤
â€¢ For real-time style
Letâ€™s spend time together and chat~
Fill in the required info on the form,
then book a time from Asobuâ€™s calendar when itâ€™s available.
*Timing may shift depending on connection and condition.*
*It may switch to first-come/lottery, or only the leave-a-message style.*

â‹ˆPrivate/personal topics are not accepted.
â‹ˆOther than that, basically no NG! (Activities/creation/chit-chat/light advice/questions are the most fun and recommended ğŸ¤)
â‹ˆReplies and video messages may take up to 14 days.
â‹ˆIf you want only a video and no chat, Iâ€™ll just record one and send it to you ğŸ¤
â‹ˆYou canâ€™t request specific video content.

Lifespan Synced
Â¥9999 / Lower perks + expanded 1on1 + named message video

9999 yen

ï¼¿ï¼¿Synced Lifespans unlock even even even more access ğŸ–¤

This plan includes all perks from â€œLifespan Verified,â€ â€œLifespan Connected,â€ and â€œLifespan Linked.â€

1. Expanded 1-on-1 from â€œLifespan Linkedâ€ ğŸ¤

Text round trips: +2 (total 6)
Video message: likely longer

2. A video message gift with your name ğŸ¤

Iâ€™ll record a video with the words you want + your name ğŸ¤
Your name can be your real name or a nickname!

â‹ˆIf the message or name includes NG content or is too long, I may ask you to revise it.
â‹ˆReplies and video messages may take up to 14 days.

log.bodyHtml:
The Journey So Far (Please keep watching over me from here on too)

2021/06/23
Started channel activities (under a different name)
2025/11/26
Restarted with a renewed stream from 666 subscribers
2025/12/24
Thank you for reaching 1,000 subscribers! The best Christmas present ğŸ¤
2026/01/03
Official debut
Watch the debut stream (the chat was super lively too)
2026/01/07
Reached 1,670 subscribers! +1,000 thank you! ğŸ‰
2026/01/30
Reached 2,000 Subscribers &During the stream, the business name was decided asâ€œMitarai Asobu â€“ Not a High-Tech Raccoon, Not a Low-Tech Raccoon, But a Cute Raccoon-Type Species, My Wifey, Konmitaâ€
Watch the anchoring stream
Goals for 2026
In 2026, Iâ€™ll work hard aiming for 10,000 subscribers! Iâ€™d be happy if you work hard together with me

notice.title: Important Notice
notice.bodyHtml:
Â¥
Regarding Financial Support
Important notice about refunds

All forms of financial support, including donations and merchandise purchases, are non-refundable.
Therefore, we are unable to respond to inquiries regarding refunds.

Please make your decision carefully before offering support.

!
About Official Images and Fan Art
Logo / Official images / Fan art / General rules

[About the Logo]

Use of the official logo for derivative works is prohibited.
This is to prevent confusion about what is official.

[Official Images]

â­• Setting them as smartphone or PC wallpapers
â­• Using them as SNS headers
â­• Creating fan art by referencing official images

âŒ Using them as SNS icons
âŒ Re-uploading or redistributing them

Using official images as icons or headers is considered the same as re-uploading them to the internet.
This is strictly prohibited.

[Fan Art Images]

â­• Using them as SNS icons

âŒ Claiming them as official
âŒ Using fan art that is extremely similar to official images as icons
(Please refrain from using anything that could be mistaken for official artwork.)

[Regarding All Images]

Posting content related to politics, religion, or other topics generally considered inappropriate for VTubers while using images related to Mitarai Asobu as your profile image is prohibited, as it may harm the Mitarai Asobu brand. Thank you for your cooperation.

ğŸ¨
Commissioning Illustrations
skeb etc. / Posting allowed / Reference images

It is OK to commission illustrators via platforms such as skeb to draw illustrations of Mitarai Asobu.

You may also post those illustrations on SNS; however, please be sure to carefully read the section above titled â€œAbout Official Images and Fan Art.â€

When posting, I would be happy if you use the hashtag #å¾¡æ‰‹æ´—ã¿ãŸã‚‰ï¼Ÿ ğŸ¤

Please share the URL of this website with the illustrator you commission. The images below should be helpful.

Sorry that a full character reference sheet is not available yet ğŸ’¦

The images below are reference materials intended for illustrators only. Please do not use them for other purposes.

stand1.png

face1.png

face2.png

â–¶
About Official Videos
No misleading edits

Please do not create or post clipped videos that are edited in a way that misrepresents the original content or intent of the stream.

ğŸ“°
About News Coverage
Summary sites / VTuber news accounts

This applies to news sites, news accounts, VTuber information hubs, and similar platforms.

Please refrain from featuring my activities on news or summary websites.

Whether the news is positive or negative, I do not wish for my activities or information to spread beyond areas I cannot be directly involved in.

I kindly ask fans not to view or share such posts.

contact.title: Contact
contact.bodyHtml:
In principle, I only respond to inquiries from companies. Please contact me at mitaraiasobu@gmail.com.

For all financial support such as tips and goods purchases, refunds are not available, so we may not be able to respond to inquiries of that kind.
Please support only with proper judgment.
